function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of traceability and verification in donation process","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combining blockchain technology with ai and gis for public surveillance","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slowdown of the global economy due to shutdown of various sectors","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete data collection from blockchain participating nodes.","category":"Open data","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untrustworthy data from existing technologies may lead to incorrect information about the spread of the coronavirus.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive research on urban design and environmental factors","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Context-specific impacts of the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for ongoing reviews and updates in pandemic research","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence on the effects of urban design on covid-19 spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Debate on the link between covid-19 prevalence and urban design characteristics","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Advocacy for compact urban development without clear evidence on its impact on disease spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connectivity as a risk factor for disease spread","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between population density and covid-19 transmission rates","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in high-density areas","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in certain phases of the epidemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between urban density and covid-19 spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory findings on the influence of urban form and design on pandemic dynamics","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the relationship between population density and covid-19 spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Smart mobility restrictions may not be effectively implemented, leading to continued spread of the virus through transportation modes.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investment in cycling and pedestrian infrastructure may limit the effectiveness of active transport modes in meeting mobility demands during pandemics.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 attributed to chinese new year, connecting flights, and rail connectivity.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association between frequency of air flights and high-speed rail services and number of infected people in destination cities.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience of bike-sharing network compared to subway system during covid-19.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication and assurance regarding the use of collected data for communal benefit","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Accessibility and affordability issues with smart solutions leading to digital divide","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and ethical use of smart technologies","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access and usage of smart technologies in different social and political contexts","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disparities in access to smart technologies","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The potential exploitation of urban-rural relationships leading to adverse events","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in government initiatives","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of food supply chains in cities due to transportation restrictions and border closures induced by covid-19","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between environmental parameters and covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive linear relationship between temperature and the number of covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drier air favors the transmission of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited and inconclusive evidence regarding the impact of wind speed on covid-19 infections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory findings on the correlation between temperature and covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting evidence on the influence of temperature on covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability of covid-19 transmission rates based on climatic conditions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of uniform strategies for covid-19 mitigation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to pollution increasing vulnerability to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of ambient environment on virus transmission dynamics","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association between high levels of air pollution and increased spread rates of covid-19, as evidenced by studies in different italian regions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal impact of traffic emission reductions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dominance of environmental quality theme in covid-19 and cities research","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Broad search string may result in irrelevant articles","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate categorization of articles","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant research due to narrow filtering","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Focus on medical issues may divert attention from other aspects of pandemic management","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities of cities to pandemics may not be fully understood","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
